body.text: If you haven’t already used Lyft, now is a great time to try it out. Public transportation in most cities in the United States is notoriously terrible: Lyft is the solution. Instead of waiting for a bus or spending a small fortune on a taxi, a Lyft driver can pick you up at your location for a very reasonable fare.

Lyft is an app-based transportation service that was founded in 2012 that provides people around the U.S. with safe, cheap rides. Local drivers, usually with their own car, join Lyft after completing an application and vetting process. Whenever you need a ride, you can open the app to request a ride from your area. Then a nearby driver will accept the ride and come to you.

Lyft is currently active in over 300 cities around the United States. This includes major cities such as New York City, Atlanta, Chicago, San Francisco, and Washington D.C., plus small cities and large towns all over the U.S. Chances are, no matter where you live, you can get a cheap ride from Lyft near you. You can check out the full list of active cities on Lyft’s website.

You don’t have to worry about carrying cash with you when you use Lyft. Once you arrive at your destination, you can pay right through the app and even choose to add a tip. You can also leave feedback for your driver

Lyft drivers are screened by a background check and DMV check. When you request a ride, you’ll be able to see your driver’s headshot, name, and picture of the car, so you’ll know you’re getting into the right car. Lyft also has a Critical Response Line if anything goes wrong.

Lyft rates vary by city and time of day, but rates are almost always significantly cheaper than a taxi. To give an example, for a 10-mile drive in San Franciso, you might pay about $23. If you’re looking for a ride during a prime time, which might cost more, the Lyft app will alert you.
Right now, if you register for Lyft and download the app, you can get $50 in credit to use on your first rides. Who wouldn’t love a free ride?
